concept.title: 52.217-4 Evaluation of Options Exercised at Time of Contract Award.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 17.208(b), insert a provision substantially the same as the following:
Evaluation of Options Exercised at Time of Contract Award (June 1988)

Except when it is determined in accordance with FAR 17.206(b) not to be in the Governmentâ€™s best interests, the Government will evaluate the total price for the basic requirement together with any option(s) exercised at the time of award.
